svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2023-03-27T08:51:22.593Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/111.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="200" width="230" height="200" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-16" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="340" y="320" width="340" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-3" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1;fontSize=15;" edge="1" parent="1" source="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-1" target="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-2"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-1" value="Perceptron Block<br style="font-size: 15px;">(to understand)" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontStyle=1;fontSize=15;strokeWidth=2;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="360" y="210" width="120" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-7" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1;fontSize=15;" edge="1" parent="1" source="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-2" target="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-6"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-2" value="Action Block<br style="font-size: 15px;">(to make decision)" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontStyle=1;fontSize=15;strokeWidth=2;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="500" y="210" width="120" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-5" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1;fontSize=15;" edge="1" parent="1" source="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-4" target="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-4" value="Img<br>(o)" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;fontSize=15;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="120" y="230" width="40" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-10" style="rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1" edge="1" parent="1" source="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-6" target="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-8"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="660" y="360" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-6" value="Act<br>(a)" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;fontSize=15;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="640" y="230" width="40" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-11" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1" edge="1" parent="1" source="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-8" target="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-4"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-27" style="rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1" edge="1" parent="1" source="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-8" target="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-25"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-8" value="Game Environment" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1;fillColor=#e1d5e7;strokeColor=#9673a6;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="460" y="340" width="160" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-12" value="True Game State (š)" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;fontSize=15;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="360" y="340" width="80" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-13" value="Sensor (Camera, Display Driver Interception)" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1;fillColor=#e1d5e7;strokeColor=#9673a6;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="160" y="340" width="160" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-17" value="Transition T" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontStyle=1;strokeWidth=2;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="350" y="380" width="110" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-18" value="" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;shape=mxgraph.basic.cloud_callout;flipV=1;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="150" y="260" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-19" value="usually call <br>it state s" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontStyle=1;fontSize=11;strokeWidth=2;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="160" y="280" width="100" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-23" value="Observation O" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontStyle=1;strokeWidth=2;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="120" y="200" width="100" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-28" style="rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1" edge="1" parent="1" source="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-25" target="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-26"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-25" value="Rewarding Scheme" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1;fillColor=#f8cecc;strokeColor=#b85450;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="480" y="420" width="120" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-29" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1" edge="1" parent="1" source="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-26" target="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-30"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="740" y="140" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="720" y="470" /> <mxPoint x="720" y="160" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-26" value="Reward (r)" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;fontSize=15;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="480" y="460" width="120" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-31" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1" edge="1" parent="1" source="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-30" target="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-32" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1" edge="1" parent="1" source="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-30" target="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-2"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="QwvEhwePLQ-ALFwR6C_A-30" value="Optimiser" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeWidth=2;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="440" y="150" width="100" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
